segments.script:
Coach Jack has revolutionized training setup. 
He focuses on a daily range. 
This makes it easy to tailor your plan. 
You start by selecting from the 'Plan Duration' options. 
Then, choose your 'Block Type'. 
This creates a training path. 
It begins at your current level. 
And it advances to more challenging goals. 
His method ensures smooth progression. 
Hours increase smoothly over the weeks. 
This avoids abrupt jumps in training stress. 
Features like 'Split Long Indoor Rides' are included. 
Customization is available for each day. 
You're equipped to build a smart plan. 
It scales from the beginning to the 12th week. 
The interface supports this planning. 
It includes tabs for 'Week/Month' and specific event dates. 
A bar chart helps track your progress visually. 
This supports an intuitive planning process.
